thread.title: J&L Marketing Announces Nicole Ledbetter as Director of National Accounts

author: cnbc.com
title: J&L Marketing Announces Nicole Ledbetter as Director of National Accounts
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- J&L Marketing announced today that Nicole Ledbetter has been named Director of National Accounts.
Nicole Ledbetter is a tenured automotive industry professional and has previously worked at Affinitiv, Dealer Product Services, AutoLoop and DMEautomotive. Ledbetter will be servicing the Mercedes-Benz, Lexus, Kia, Mazda and Hyundai national accounts at J&L Marketing.
Ledbetter said, “It’s very exciting to be part of a company that is focusing on growth and innovation. Technology is constantly evolving and changing the way consumers are shopping for vehicles as well as servicing those vehicles. J&L Marketing is more than just a sales and service event provider – we are investigating and creating powerful solutions and strategies to address the pain points of driving quality sales traffic and service retention for dealers. I’m looking forward to bringing these innovations to the forefront of our OEM, dealers group, and franchise dealer partners.”
“Nicole brings to J&L Marketing a strategic-minded sales focus that delivers proven results for the customer and aligns with their desired outcome,” said Kirk Cave, Vice President of Sales at J&L Marketing.
For more information about the changes in leadership at J&L Marketing, contact Kirk Cave at KCave@jandlmarketing.com or 800.651.5508.
J&L MARKETING
J&L Marketing is a digital and direct marketing company based in Louisville, KY. The company has specialized in increasing traffic and conversions for the automotive industry since 1991. J&L Marketing has more than 200 employees and representatives throughout the United States. More information is available at www.jandlmarketing.com .
